TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataRowState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Gets the state of a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DataRowState enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
## Examples The following example first creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one column, then creates a single <xref:System.Data.DataRow>. As the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> is created, added, modified, and deleted, its <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> is printed.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData DataRowState Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.datarowstate_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowState Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.data.datarowstate_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Added = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The row has been added to a , and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> has not been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Deleted = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The row was deleted using the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Delete%2A> method of the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Detached = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The row has been created but is not part of any . A is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Modified = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The row has been modified and <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> has not been called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowState Unchanged = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The row has not changed since <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> was last called.
